<<<<<<< HEAD
Graces, to be said at the table before and after meat Very necessary for young people and children, with morning and evening prayer.
[48] p. : ill. (woodcuts)
printed by J. Bell, and are to be sold at the east-end of Christ-Church, London : 1655.
The first and last leaves contain the same woodcuts. Running title reads: A book of graces. Signatures: A-C. Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======
